item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 22, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Jeff Geerling – They stole my voice with AI (78 points | 16 comments)
2. Sanding UI (373 points | 98 comments)
3. What happened to the Japanese PC platforms? (122 points | 53 comments)
4. Fable at 20: a uniquely British video game with a complex legacy (55 points | 27 comments)

8. Pulsar: Secure Steganography for Diffusion Models (16 points | 2 comments)
9. LHC experiments at CERN observe quantum entanglement at the highest energy yet (97 points | 61 comments)
10. Infineon's CO2 Sensor Monitors Indoor Air Quality (75 points | 42 comments)

15. Analyzing the OpenAPI Tooling Ecosystem (73 points | 12 comments)

17. Twenty Years of FM Synthesis Inside Ableton Live (14 points | discuss)
18. Show HN: PDF to MD by LLMs – Extract Text/Tables/Image Descriptives by GPT4o (4 points | discuss)
19. Substack (YC W18) Is Hiring Machine Learning Engineers ( | hide)

23. Mount Unix system into Common Lisp image (89 points | 11 comments)
24. Scientists find new blood group after 50-year mystery (106 points | 8 comments)
25. Omega-3 intake counteracts symptoms of anxiety and depression in mice (230 points | 110 comments)
26. Forget ChatGPT: why researchers now run small AIs on their laptops (503 points | 290 comments)
27. Rust clean-slate POSIX CLI utilities 0.2.1 release: Awk, M4, ftw and more (26 points | 1 comment)
28. WP Engine is not WordPress (112 points | 79 comments)
29. The Miraculous Resurrection of Notre-Dame (66 points | 38 comments)
30. Restish: CLI for interacting with REST-ish HTTP APIs with some nice features (8 points | discuss)
